original_title: The Adventures of Young Indiana Jones: Espionage Escapades
overview: Sixteen-year-old Indiana Jones joins an international trio of spies plotting against their German counterparts in the neutral city of Barcelona. Then later the same year, Indiana is reassigned to Prague where he is to receive an important phone call.
tagline: As the British would say, theyâ€™re a very crack squad.
